title: Need a Room
body:
QR Code Link to This Post


I am a black lady looking for a room ideally in zone 2 or 3. I have a budget so if you have a room that you know is expensive then please don't offer it to me. It has to be my own room, not looking to share. 

I am not doing anything intimate or etc, so don't come to me with that. I already live somewhere so I'm not desperate just want to see if I can go cheaper.

Ideally I want to move at the end of January or sometime in February. So, I am getting a head start.

Please dont waste my time or yours, just tell me the location and the price in the first email.
